short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create, manage, and identify your site's environments quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify and manage your website environments. Register the environments for each url and an element will be displayed on the screen when accessing.
